Amazing game with special gameplay , In this game you dont get better guns and better players with better skills/stats. No matter if you have only 1 hour or 1000 hours in this game , everyone will have the same stuff
(excluding skins that dont give any kind of competitive advantage )

A valve não se importa com a experiência de jogo dos usuários, muitos jogadores usam hacks que oferecem vantagens, como enxergar através de paredes e/ou auxílio de mira, e não recebem qualquer punição. A comunidade em si é um lixo, os jogadores não se respeitam e/ou são desonestos. A jogabilidade é excelente, mas o jogo é uma terra sem lei, puro estresse e perda de tempo.
good game but a lot of cheater in MM, ( doing this for achievements)
Recomendaria pelo game entre amigos, porque se for pra jogar normal na internet, nem compensa a compra, so hacks e mais hacks...
Topp so falta o mibr ganhar agr
It's fun , u need to aim with both the AK and the M4.
the game was enjoyable 2 years ago when it was not free and no senseless patches were added, I think there are much better games for 2020 at this price
ебал я тот рот и мои нервы

As a former CS player (played it a really really long time ago, then again during lock-down and then found CS GO), this is an incredible game that builds on CS. If you liked CS, you are going to love CS GO. Graphics are improved, it is more realistic, there are tons of modes of play, including competitive (ranked).
